alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:36PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Geneva, south central Houston, western Jackson, central Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 235 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cottonwood to near Hartford. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Marianna, Hartford, Slocomb, Bradford, Cottondale, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Esto, Madrid, Westville, Campbellton, Noma, Black and Kellys Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. Heavy rainfall is also possible with these storms.
